dmca.title: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com
dmca.body:
Please note that the URL below-referenced does not reside within our
network as of 1:57:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on August 1, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet
 


-----Original Message-----
From: Yvonne Sharpy [mailto:YSharpy@frosszelnick.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, July 26, 2006 4:37 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com
Subject: RE: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com


Dear Sir or Madam:

It seems that www.bag4us.com has started selling counterfeit Lacoste
again.
Please advise as to the status of this matter.  Thank you.

Thanks and regards,
Yvonne Sharpy 

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2006 5:54 PM
To: Lacoste team - Fross Zelnick; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com

To Whom It May Concern:



This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.



Legal Response Team

The Planet




---------


From: Yvonne Sharpy [mailto:YSharpy@frosszelnick.com]

Posted At: Monday, May 15, 2006 6:32 PM

Posted To: Copyright

Conversation: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com

Subject: RE: Trademark Complaint from Lacoste bag4us.com





Dear Sir or Madam:



I just checked the website and our client's Mark "LACOSTE" is still
listed on the home page. Please have www.bag4us.com remove our client's
mark for its home page. Thank you.



Yvonne Sharpy

Fross Zelnick Lehrman & Zissu, P.C.

866 United Nations Plaza

New York, NY 10017

Direct: 212-813-8248

Fax: 212-813-5901
  
--------------------------------------------------------

The information contained in this email message may be privileged,
confidential, and protected from disclosure. Any unauthorized use,
printing, copying, disclosure or dissemination of this communication may
be subject to legal restriction or sanction. If you think that you have
received this email message in error, please reply to the sender.
 
--------------------------------------------------------
